title: Rebirth With The Beast - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Beastkin   Calm Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magical Space   Mpreg   Multiple Transported Individuals   Shapeshifters   Transmigration   Tribal Society   Unconditional Love
author: 夜不私语
description:
When a special police officer Su Yi performed his mission, he was shot. He thought he was dead, but he didn’t expect to be born again. 

Reborn into a misbehaving female who already had a partner and had a bun (child), Su Yi had to live in this cruel orc world and later had a good impression of his own husband.>
